# fivethirtyeight

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/rudeboybert/fivethirtyeight.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/rudeboybert/fivethirtyeight)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/fivethirtyeight)](http://cran.r-project.org/package=fivethirtyeight)
[![CRAN RStudio mirror downloads](http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/fivethirtyeight)](http://www.r-pkg.org/pkg/fivethirtyeight)

R package of data and code behind the stories and interactives at [FiveThirtyEight](https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data).



## Installation & Usage

Get the released version from CRAN:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("fivethirtyeight")
```

Or the development version from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# If you haven't installed devtools yet, do so:
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rudeboybert/fivethirtyeight")
```

Example usage:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(fivethirtyeight)
data(package = "fivethirtyeight")
# Bechdel data set
data(bechdel)
head(bechdel)
?bechdel
# If using RStudio:
View(bechdel)
```



## More Information

See the package vignette for:

1. Our motivation for creating this package
1. Guidelines we followed preparing the data sets and links to the code
1. A more detailed outline of all data sets

```{r, eval = FALSE}
vignette("fivethirtyeight", package = "fivethirtyeight")
```
